moves.name: Wide Guard
moves.effect: The user takes up a defensive posture. Using this move again will make the user leave this defensive posture. No other actions can be taken when in this defensive posture. Nullifies moves that target all allies when hit by such a move while in this defensive posture, then the user leaves the defensive posture.

moves.name: Leech Life
moves.effect: The more damage dealt to the target, the more this move restores the user’s HP.

moves.name: Karpe Diem!
moves.effect: Uses a maximum of 3 slots of the user’s move gauge. The more amount used, the more this move raises Attack and Defense of all allied sync pairs (can be raised by up to 4 stat ranks maximum). Applies the Gradual Healing effect to all allied sync pairs.

passives.name: Group Fire Guard
passives.description: Reduces the damage all allied sync pairs take when attacked by Fire-type moves.

passives.name: Group Water Guard
passives.description: Reduces the damage all allied sync pairs take when attacked by Water-type moves.

passives.name: Propelling Strike 9
passives.description: Charges the user’s move gauge by one when its attack move is successful.

grid.bonus: Wide Guard:MP Refresh 5- Has a chance (60%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Water Gun:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Leech Life:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Karpe Diem!:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Karpe Diem!:Move Gauge Refresh 9- Charges the user’s move gauge by one when its move is successful.
Endurance- When the user enters battle with full HP, applies the Enduring effect to it.
Stalwart- Sp. Def cannot be lowered.
Racing Rain 2- Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is rainy.
Vigilance- Protects the user against critical hits.
Critical Strike 1- Powers up the user’s attacks when they become critical hits.
Stamina Reserves 6- Charges the user’s move gauge by 6 the first time it is in a pinch each battle.
Rain Gear 1- Reduces damage when the user is hit by an attack move while the weather is rainy.
Catalytic Cure 1- Has a chance (20%) of restoring the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP when its move is successful.
Tough Cookie- The more the user’s Defense is raised, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Refreshing Rain 1- Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action while the weather is rainy.
HP Trade-Off 4- The smaller the user’s percentage of remaining HP, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Block and Heal 9- Restores the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP when the user nullifies an opponent’s move while in a defensive posture.
Block and Charge 1- Charges the user’s move gauge by 1 when it nullifies an opponent’s move while in a defensive posture.
